scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a ram standing in a natural setting, surrounded by foliage. The ram is shown in profile, facing right, with its head slightly lowered. Its body is covered in stylized wool, and it has prominent, curled horns. The background is filled with a dense pattern of dots and leaves, suggesting a lush environment. The scene is framed by an arched border with decorative elements at the top corners. The ram, a symbol of sacrifice and Christ, is rendered in a woodcut style typical of medieval manuscripts.
